name: Nursery Nightmare
overview: Get the baby safely to a bottle of milk, avoid the nightmare elements coming at you and for goodness sake don't try to take the baby through the greens. Nursery nightmare is an original arcade game written in fast machine code for the commodore 64, which will require all your powers of skill and reflex co-ordination to get into the multi-screen action. With s levels of increasing difficulty, you will soon realize what the nightmare is, as you attempt to pacify "Baby" who needs constant feeding. You need to pick up the bottles of milk which are across the other side of the nursery and avoid the infants toys which create hazards in your path. Failure to look after the baby properly will see the appearance of Angry Agnes the anguished mother, hell bent on revenge.
